p: A total of 99 articles with 133 records and a sample size of 979,659 reported HIV prevalence in PWID and FSWs, of which 74 articles with 95 records were on PWID and 29 articles with 38 records were on FSWs. The overall prevalence of HIV among PWID was estimated to be 15% (95% CI: 12–18%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 99.37%) and 5% among FSWs (95% CI: 4–5%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 99.41%) ( Supplementary Figures S1 and S2, Table 2).
